title: Question 2
prompt:
Sentence 4: Be sure to discuss your situation with your employer if your main goal is a higher salary.

Which of the following is the best rewrite of sentence 4?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
This sentence has an independent clause and a subordinate clause. The independent clause is “Be sure to discuss your situation with your employer.” The dependent clause is “if your main goal is a higher salary.”
Be sure to discuss your situation with your employer if your main goal is a higher salary.
The sentence can be rewritten without changing its meaning by switching the independent clause and the subordinate clause.The revised sentence reads, “If your main goal is a higher salary, be sure to discuss your situation with your employer.”
